views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10 to 13(Including arm64e/A12 Devices) and Last Available YouTube Version.

AskActionTube Gives the Opportunity to Show the Confirmations Popup Alerts Before Taking Actions on YouTube when Videos are Playing!

The Tweak Moreover Provides Other Features like Removing the Previous and Next Buttons and the Related Landscape Videos View, Making Play the Videos in Background and Hiding the Scrolling Indicators!

AskActionTube has also Bundled in (Includes as Options) NoPreviousNextButtons, NoRelatedVideosView, ByeTubeScrollIndicator and YouPlayInGroundTube Tweaks Available on My Repository.

More Options are Always Planned to Come!

You can Also Launch with Ease YouTube Application inside the Preferences of AskActionTube.

Configure options from Settings.

No Respring Needed for Enabling and Disabling the Tweak and its Every options.

If You Enable the First Main Switch, that Turns On All The Confirmations Alerts, Leave Off the Individual options Otherwise the Alerts Will Be Shown Twice.

See Screenshots below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)
would be greatly appreciated!

R.I.P. My Dear Friend Dennis D. Bednarz, i will Miss YOU so Much!

Version 1.0.1
- Tested/Improved and working fine till iOS 13 and the Last YouTube Version too.
- Added the option to Cast Video Tap Confirmation (thanks @Jamie_Devvix).
- Added the option to Hide the StatusBar inside the App.

Happy New Year to All of You!
